Winners Bash

Join in the fun to hear the 1st, 2nd and 3rd place winners be announced at the Best of Lawrence Winners Bash on Wednesday, August 28th at Abe & Jakes. Tickets & reserved tables are on sale now!

In the top 5? Claim your free ticket HERE.
